channel.title: Indiana Wesleyan University Athletic Department - News

item.title: [Women's Basketball] Second Half Fuels Women’s Basketball Win over #24 Cornerstone
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- A two point game at halftime turned into a 73-55 victory for No. 3 Indiana Wesleyan University women’s basketball over visiting No. 24 Cornerstone (Mich.) on Saturday in Luckey Arena.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Women's Basketball] No Ticket Saturday as Women’s Basketball Hosts Top-25 Showdown
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- When Indiana Wesleyan University women’s basketball hosts Cornerstone (Mich.) on Saturday all who attend will receive free admission into the game.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Women's Basketball] Women’s Basketball Opens League Play with Blowout Win
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- Indiana Wesleyan University women’s basketball used a stifling defensive effort on Tuesday night in Luckey Arena to open Crossroads League play with a 74-49 victory over Bethel (Ind.).
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Men's Basketball] Men’s Basketball Takes Come-From-Behind Win in Top-10 Showdown
item.description: MISHAWAKA, Ind. -- The Crossroads League men’s basketball season opened tonight and the top-10 showdown between No. 1 Indiana Wesleyan and No. 10 Bethel (Ind.) in Mishawaka highlighted the slate.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Cross Country] Cross Country Boasts 17 NAIA Scholar-Athletes
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- Indiana Wesleyan University cross country was well represented today as the NAIA national office released the men’s and women’s cross country NAIA Scholar-Athletes lists.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Men's Soccer] Bronkema Named to Capital One Academic All-America First Team
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- Indiana Wesleyan University senior defender Dylan Bronkema (SR/Rockford, Mich.) has been selected to the prestigious Capital One Academic All-America Men’s Soccer First Team in the College Division.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Volleyball] Volleyball Learns Pool Play Opponents at NAIA National Championship
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- The NAIA national office has released the pool play assignments and schedule for the 2014 NAIA Volleyball National Championship that will be contested on December 2-6 in Sioux City, Iowa.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Volleyball] Volleyball Beats Stritch in Five Sets, Advances to NAIA Final Site
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- Indiana Wesleyan University volleyball is heading west to Sioux City, Iowa for the fourth straight season as they defeated Cardinal Stritch (Wis.) 3-2 in Luckey Arena in the NAIA National Championship Opening Round.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Men's Soccer] Men’s Soccer Eliminated in PK Shootout
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- The best season in Indiana Wesleyan University men’s soccer history came to an early and disappointing end on Saturday night in the NAIA National Championship Opening Round.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Men's Cross Country] Men’s Cross Country Finishes 12th at NAIA National Championship
item.description: LAWRENCE, Kan. -- Indiana Wesleyan University placed in the top-third of the NAIA Men’s Cross Country National Championship on Saturday as they finished 12th of 36 teams at Rim Rock Farm in Lawrence, Kansas.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Women's Cross Country] Women’s Cross Country Places 19th at NAIA National Championship
item.description: LAWRENCE, Kan. -- Indiana Wesleyan University earned a 19th place finish today at the NAIA Women’s Cross Country National Championship held at Rim Rock Farm in Lawrence, Kansas.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [IWU] Four Wildcat Teams Ready for National Championship Saturday
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- Indiana Wesleyan University will be well represented on Saturday in the NAIA national scene as four Wildcat teams compete in NAIA National Championships.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Men's Basketball] Men’s Basketball Hits Century Mark for Third Straight Game
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- No. 1-ranked Indiana Wesleyan University men’s basketball continued its dominant start to the 2014-15 season as they cruised to a 104-71 victory over visiting Judson (Ill.) on Wednesday night in Luckey Arena.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [IWU] Whole New Wesley to be Revealed Tonight!
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- An epic night is in store for Luckey Arena this evening as a whole new Wesley Wildcat will be revealed during halftime of the men's basketball game with Judson.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Volleyball] Six Wildcats Honored in Crossroads League Volleyball Postseason Honors
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- Regular season and postseason tournament champion Indiana Wesleyan University had six members of the team recognized by the Crossroads League for their outstanding performances during the 2014 volleyball season.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt
